name: Next Docs
description: Built a high-performance, real-time collaborative editor using TipTap and Liveblocks, facilitating seamless multi-user document editing.
challenges: Handling real-time document collaboration and resolving conflicts when multiple users edit the same document.

name: Rawg Clone
description: Created as a front-end learning exercise, this clone mirrors the popular gaming information site RAWG. Built with React, TypeScript, Prisma, and MongoDB, it fetches game data from the RAWG APIâ€”the ultimate video game database. Explore games, discover details, and much more!
challenges: Integrating RAWG API efficiently and optimizing the UI for game discovery.

name: Issue Tracker Application
description: Developed using Next.js, Prisma, and NextAuth, this platform streamlines issue management. Assign tasks to users, analyze issue status, and collaborate seamlessly. MongoDB ensures robust data storage.
challenges: Implementing secure authentication and designing a user-friendly issue management workflow.

name: Cloudify Data
description: Cloudify Data is a responsive website built as a hands-on project to practice HTML, CSS, and responsive design techniques. The focus was on crafting layouts, ensuring mobile-friendly designs, and applying modern styling practices. A great example of learning through practical implementation!
challenges: Ensuring fully responsive design across all devices and optimizing CSS for maintainability.
